system.effect: "Goliath Factory Ship" Unique Component. Allows collection+refining of stellar plasma with ores. Make two +10 Pilot (Space Craft) +Manoeuvrability Tests near Blue-Giant Star. Fail by 5 DoF destroys ship. Success gathers full load. +100 Achievement Points to Endeavour. One per Vessel, designed only for its listed ship.
